column1: Determining Solvability in the Birds of a Feather Card Game
Birds of a Feather is a single-player card game in which cards are arranged in a grid. The player attempts to combine stacks of cards under certain rules
column2: with the goal being to combine all cards into a single stack. This paper highlights several approaches for efficiently classifying whether a randomlychosen state has a single-stack solution. These approaches use graph theory and machine learning concepts to prune a stateâ€™s search space
column3: resulting in significant reductions in runtime relative to a baseline search.
